Items.Title: Application number C 250085 MMX (Bally's Ferry Point Map Amendment) submitted by Bally's New York Operating Company, LLC and the New York City Department of Parks and Recreation, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 199 for an amendment to the City Map involving: the establishment of Ring Road; the elimination of Park South of Schley Avenue; the adjustments of grades and block dimensions necessitated thereby; and the authorization for any acquisition or disposition of real property related thereto, in accordance with Map No. 13154 dated January 15, 2025 and signed by the Borough President, Borough of the Bronx, Community District 10, Council District 13.

Items.MatterName: Zoning, Bally's Ferry Point Map Amendment, Bronx (C 250085 MMX).
